settings.accordion_name_p:
Because YatesMD treats male pattern baldness (also known as androgenic alopecia), only those assigned male at birth can use Keeps.

For women seeking help to stop their hair loss, we do provide educational information about the different types of alopecia and what treatments are available for each.

settings.heading_text_inner: Please text or call us at (833) 745-3377, chat us, or email us at help@YatesMD.com.
settings.heading_Inner: Para soporte en español, envíenos un mensaje de texto a (833) 745-3377 o envíenos un correo electrónico a help@YatesMD.com.
